name: Space of One Drama
description:
The story of a father and son trying to survive on the stages of a mysterious theater.

Space of One Drama is a 2D adventure game with action elements. The main character tries to save his son in this difficult moment of their life. However, the theatre is eager for drama and will do a lot to get it.

  • Hand-drawn adventure game with a unique style
  • A story told on the stage of a mysterious theater
  • Logical puzzles with action elements
  • Full controller suport
  • And more to come!

- Stay tuned for more news coming up soon!
- Follow Space of one Drama for updates and official announcements.

* Current build status: Alpha
